item.description:
Our first event was a pizza party at NEBO (http://www.neborestau...) on 4/7/09. We will do it all over again on 4/7/10. The evening will begin with drinks from 6:00-7:00. At 7:00, I'll order pizzas based on the number of people there. There will be different kinds- from margherita to scampi(shrimp) to napoletana(anchovies, capers, black olives). Please check in with me when you arrive and let me have $6 to cover the cost of the pizzas. Everyone will be on their own in paying for drinks. After getting your slices, you'll be able to sit, stand or mingle until all of the pizza is gone. At that point, we'll head over to Caffe Vittoria for cappuccino, espresso and Italian pastries. The restaurant is located at 90 North Washington St., diagonally across the street from Joe Tecce's.-From North Station, walk down Causeway St. toward the North End, but before you get to the large intersection at the bridge, go right on N. Washington. It's a 5-minute walk. We'll have the entire front of the restaurant reserved for our group. It should be fun.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the near end of the bar.
item.name: NEBO-2nd Annual Pizza Party
